msg: Fix CHANGES.txt to reflect the twisted evolution and current state of the Admin UI "Files" conf directory File Browser.  Moved issue descriptions to the 5.0 section for the trunk-only - but currently disabled (see SOLR-5539) - ability to create and modify files in the conf dir.
